attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a british subject i recently found out that foreign workers are being subsidised by the government , we demand the full same rights as equals to foreign workers in this country

rejection.details: You need to create a petition title which is a clear call-to-action, not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
